data.name: The role of digital health in responding to COVID-19
data.summary: This webinar will discuss the role of digital health in responding to COVID-19 and the future of digital health and health systems in a post-COVID environment
data.speakers:
Russel Duncan,  Chief Technology Officer, Telstra Health
Dr Vincent McCauley, Chief Medical Officer
Alison Verhoeven, CEO, Australian Healthcare & Hospitals Association
Dr. Megan Robertson, Board Director, Digital Health CRC & Group Chief Research Officer, St Vincentâ€™s Health Australia
